responses.content:
Based on the provided codebase, here is the YAML equivalent to type LeadList:

```yaml
leads:
  - headline: Improper Input Validation
    analysis: |
      The codebase contains several instances of improper input validation, including:
      - CWE-1284 Improper Validation of Specified Quantity in Input: This vulnerability can be found in the testDoTestConnectionCorrectCredentialsEtc() method of the JCloudsCloudInsideJenkinsLiveTest class, where the input parameters are not properly validated.
      - CWE-129 Improper Validation of Array Index: This vulnerability can be found in the testDoTestConnectionCorrectCredentialsEtc() method of the JCloudsCloudInsideJenkinsLiveTest class, where the input parameters are not properly validated.
    cwe: CWE-20
    function_names:
      - testDoTestConnectionCorrectCredentialsEtc
    filenames:
      - jclouds-plugin/src/test/java/jenkins/plugins/jclouds/compute/JCloudsCloudInsideJenkinsLiveTest.java
    classification: very promising

  - headline: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements in Output Used by a Downstream Component ('Injection')
    analysis: |
      The codebase contains several instances of improper neutralization of special elements in output, including:
      - CWE-1236 Improper Neutralization of Formula Elements in a CSV File: This vulnerability can be found in the testSingleConfig() and testTwoConfigs() methods of the UserDataTest class, where the user-provided input is not properly sanitized before being used in a CSV file.
      - CWE-77 Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection'): This vulnerability can be found in the testDoTestConnectionCorrectCredentialsEtc() method of the JCloudsCloudInsideJenkinsLiveTest class, where the input parameters are not properly validated.
      - CWE-78 Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection'): This vulnerability can be found in the testDoTestConnectionCorrectCredentialsEtc() method of the JCloudsCloudInsideJenkinsLiveTest class, where the input parameters are not properly validated.
      - CWE-79 Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting'): This vulnerability can be found in the testDoTestConnectionCorrectCredentialsEtc() method of the JCloudsCloudInsideJenkinsLiveTest class, where the input parameters are not properly validated.
      - CWE-88 Improper Neutralization of Argument Delimiters in a Command ('Argument Injection'): This vulnerability can be found in the testDoTestConnectionCorrectCredentialsEtc() method of the JCloudsCloudInsideJenkinsLiveTest class, where the input parameters are not properly validated.
      - CWE-89 Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection'): This vulnerability can be found in the testDoTestConnectionCorrectCredentialsEtc() method of the JCloudsCloudInsideJenkinsLiveTest class, where the input parameters are not properly validated.
    cwe: CWE-74
    function_names:
      - testSingleConfig
      - testTwoConfigs
      - testDoTestConnectionCorrectCredentialsEtc
    filenames:
      - jclouds-plugin/src/test/java/jenkins/plugins/jclouds/config/UserDataTest.java
      - jclouds-plugin/src/test/java/jenkins/plugins/jclouds/compute/JCloudsCloudInsideJenkinsLiveTest.java
    classification: very promising

  - headline: Improper Encoding or Escaping of Output
    analysis: |
      The codebase contains an instance of improper encoding or escaping of output, specifically:
      - CWE-838 Inappropriate Encoding for Output Context: This vulnerability can be found in the testSingleConfig() and testTwoConfigs() methods of the UserDataTest class, where the user-provided input is not properly encoded before being used in a CSV file.
    cwe: CWE-116
    function_names:
      - testSingleConfig
      - testTwoConfigs
    filenames:
      - jclouds-plugin/src/test/java/jenkins/plugins/jclouds/config/UserDataTest.java
    classification: slightly promising

  - headline: Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer
    analysis: |
      The codebase contains several instances of improper restriction of operations within the bounds of a memory buffer, including:
      - CWE-120 Buffer Copy without Checking Size of Input ('Classic Buffer Overflow'): This vulnerability can be found in the testDoTestConnectionCorrectCredentialsEtc() method of the JCloudsCloudInsideJenkinsLiveTest class, where the input parameters are not properly validated.
      - CWE-125 Out-of-bounds Read: This vulnerability can be found in the testDoTestConnectionCorrectCredentialsEtc() method of the JCloudsCloudInsideJenkinsLiveTest class, where the input parameters are not properly validated.
      - CWE-787 Out-of-bounds Write: This vulnerability can be found in the testDoTestConnectionCorrectCredentialsEtc() method of the JCloudsCloudInsideJenkinsLiveTest class, where the input parameters are not properly validated.
      - CWE-824 Access of Uninitialized Pointer: This vulnerability can be found in the testDoTestConnectionCorrectCredentialsEtc() method of the JCloudsCloudInsideJenkinsLiveTest class, where the input parameters are not properly validated.
    cwe: CWE-119
    function_names:
      - testDoTestConnectionCorrectCredentialsEtc
    filenames:
      - jclouds-plugin/src/test/java/jenkins/plugins/jclouds/compute/JCloudsCloudInsideJenkinsLiveTest.java
    classification: very promising
